alert.note: Alert for Concho (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 4:01PM CST until March 02 at 4:45PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN COLEMAN...NORTHWESTERN MCCULLOCH AND NORTHERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 401 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 765, or near Paint Rock, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Millersview around 410 PM CST. Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina around 415 PM CST. Stacy and Leaday around 420 PM CST. Gouldbusk and Waldrip around 430 PM CST. Rockwood around 435 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, Fisk, The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 765 and Shields. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
